      • MyFarm

        The constructor method for the MyFarm class. Initializing all the necessary requirements.

    • Method Detail

      • advanceDay

        public void advanceDay()
        Advances to the next day and increases the day count. Sets any tiles with withered crops to "withered" and resets the "watered" status on all crops.

      • getCrops

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getCrops()
        The getCrops function gets all the names of the crops in the crops array list.
        Returns:
        cropsAvailable the names of all the crops.

      • checkTilesHasPlant

        public boolean checkTilesHasPlant()
        Checks all the plantable tiles in the farm if they contain a crop.
        Returns:
        false if ALL tiles do not have any crops or only withered crops, otherwise return true.

      • checkGameOver

        public boolean checkGameOver()
        Checks if all the game ending scenarios are true, will return true if either of them are true and false if not.
        Returns:
        a boolean if the game continues or not.

      • gameReset

        public void gameReset()
        Resets all the game values.

      • getTile

        public Tile[][] getTile()
        a getter function for the tiles in play
        Returns:
        the tile inside the farm.

      • getCurrentDay

        public int getCurrentDay()
        a getter function for the current day
        Returns:
        the current day of the game loop.

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer()
        a getter function for the player
        Returns:
        the player.
